mapper.select: select * from filminfo,filmtype WHERE dateTime >= #{dangDate} AND dateTime < #{houDate} AND filminfo.typeID=filmtype.typeID ORDER BY dateTime desc

SELECT f.filmID,f.filmName FROM ticketinfo as t,playinfo as p,filminfo as f WHERE t.playID=p.playID and p.filmID=f.filmID and t.ticketTime >= #{hou} and t.ticketTime < #{dang} GROUP BY f.filmID ORDER BY COUNT(f.filmID) desc LIMIT 10
